title: SMC_SEGMENT (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_SEGMENT : STRUCT
This structure is used internally by the
SMC_Interpolator
.
It represents a path segment of fixed length in which
a certain acceleration shape is used.

rows.Name: dVelStart
rows.Comment: Velocity at the beginning of the segment

rows.Name: dVelEnd
rows.Comment: Velocity at the end of the segment

rows.Name: iStartObj
rows.Comment: Position of the start object in the queue

rows.Name: dPosInStartObj
rows.Comment:
Beginning of segment relative to the start point of the
start object

rows.Name: iDestObj
rows.Comment: Position of the last object in the queue

rows.Name: dPosInDestObj
rows.Comment:
End of segment relative to the start point of the
destination object

rows.Name: dJerk
rows.Comment: Jerk (signed), only used for changing acceleration
